Title: makeDate32
Description: Creates a date of type Date32 from a year, month, day (or optionally a year and a day).
year — Year. Integer, Float or Decimal.month — Month (optional). Integer, Float or Decimal.day — Day. Integer, Float or Decimal.
NoteIf month is omitted then day should take a value between 1 and 365, otherwise it should take a value between 1 and 31.
A date created from the arguments. Date32.
